description: 30-minute online open-book quiz covering the first three weeks of course content, held before the end of Week 3
Individual assignment applying existing machine learning code on benchmark datasets to learn model evaluation and result reporting, due Week 5
Group project applying machine learning methods to real-world applications, requiring a technical report (1000+ words with 10 references), code, and data submission, due Week 10
2-hour exam testing all course topics through MCQs, short answers, and coding/problem-solving components. Hurdle requirement: 50% minimum to pass course
